A friend of mine and I are writing a skit set during the Bakumatsu 
and focuses mostly on the conflict between the Shinsengumi and the 
Choshu. Anyway, I'm in a bit of a jam since I have one character who 
is from the Mimiwarigumi. However, I have no idea what the 
Mimiwarigumi uniform looked like. If anyone can help me find a 
discription and/or picture of the Mimiwarigumi uniform, that would 
be greatly appreciated...
